se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.impl

Class StaticCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.impl.StaticCredentials

  • public class StaticCredentials
extends Object
    Utility class that holds pre-generated key pairs.

    Mainly useful for testing, but also when to-be-signed bytes are calculated.

    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@litsec.se)

    • Constructor Detail

      • StaticCredentials

        public StaticCredentials()
        Constructor.

      • StaticCredentials

        public StaticCredentials(int rsaKeySize,
                         String ecCurve)
        Constructor setting the key size for RSA and curve for EC to use.
        Parameters:
        rsaKeySize - RSA key size in bits (default is 2048)
        ecCurve - identifier for EC curve to use (default is "P-256")

    • Method Detail

      • getSigningCredential

        public SigningCredential getSigningCredential(String algorithmUri)
                                       throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Returns a SigningCredential that can be used to sign using the supplied algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithmUri - the signature algorithm URI
        Returns:
        a SigningCredential instance
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the supplied algorithm is not supported

      • getRsaKeyPair

        public KeyPair getRsaKeyPair()
                      throws InvalidParameterException
        Gets the generated RSA key pair.
        Returns:
        the RSA key pair.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if the keysize is incorrect

      • getEcKeyPair

        public KeyPair getEcKeyPair()
                     throws InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Gets the generated EC key pair.
        Returns:
        the EC key pair
        Throws:
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - for unsupported curve
